parameters.name: CriteriaType
parameters.description:
The type of the information that you want to query. Valid values:

*   **EDGE**: connection information

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: DstNode
parameters.description: The information about the destination node.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end time of the network connection.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: 20. If you leave this parameter empty, 20 entries are returned on each page.

> We recommend that you do not leave this parameter empty.

parameters.name: SrcNode
parameters.description: The information about the source node.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The start time of the network connection.
